BR_text.BRsummary: Annotations should error out on empty Frame
BR_text.BRdescription:
Right now, I get back a new SFrame without an annotation column
 <denchmark-code>In [16]: aa = tc.image_classifier.annotate(sf[0:0])
 
 In [17]: aa
 Out[17]:
 Columns:
 	path	str
 	image	Image
 
 Rows: 0
 
 Data:
 	[]
 </denchmark-code>
